dcterms:creator: Giovanni Da San Martino
Seunghak Yu
Alberto Barrón-Cedeño
Preslav Nakov
dcterms:description: The Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC) consists of news articles with sentences labeled as propaganda or non-propaganda. It is used for fine-grained propaganda detection tasks, including sentence-level and fragment-level classification.
dcterms:title: Propaganda Techniques Corpus (PTC)
